com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger

Class PosTagSequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<PosTaggedToken>
          • com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.PosTagSequence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassificationSolution, Solution, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<PosTagSequence>, java.lang.Iterable<PosTaggedToken>, java.util.Collection<PosTaggedToken>, java.util.List<PosTaggedToken>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class PosTagSequence
extends java.util.ArrayList<PosTaggedToken>
implements java.lang.Comparable<PosTagSequence>, ClassificationSolution
    A sequence of postags applied to a given token sequence.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
    See Also:
